name: ἐρημίτης
description:
Since time immemorial individuals have left the tribe to look for something else. During hellenic times such individuals left to the desert so they were called eremites...

How to play

Collect white energy to increase your casting abilities and grey energy to open gates.

X — Select / Cast hieroglyphs
Arrow keys — Move

Credits

orion_black (@orion_black) — Code, art and game design
Mark Sparling (@markymark665) — Music
